Goal Representation:
['1. Gently place the cat in the bathtub and use water to thoroughly shower the cat.', '2. Use a tow
el to dry the cat completely.']

behavior gently_place_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Gently place the cat inside the bathtub

behavior thoroughly_shower_cat(cat:item, shower:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(cat)
        # Ensure the cat is thoroughly showered with water from the shower

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select the bathtub
        bind shower: item where:
            is_shower(shower) and close(shower, bathtub)
        # Select the shower that is close to the bathtub
        gently_place_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
        # Place the cat in the bathtub
        thoroughly_shower_cat(cat, shower)
        # Shower the cat thoroughly with water
